column4: I'm getting a hang on startup. What could be the problem? http://i.imgur.com/KVtUB.jpg
it goes for a reboot, so it doesn't look like a hang
possible reasons are a filesystem check, something in the autostart which does a reboot or an init script which does that
in that case it might be a filesystem which takes long to unmount   (e.g. NFS or CIFS which lost it's connection), or simply an ACPI issue. Is this reproducible?
